renderpass.code:
// multiscale variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/dssyDs

#define rot(a)      mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                    // rotation
#define T(q) (                                                               \
        q.xy = length(q.xy) * cos( mod(atan(q.y,q.x)+1.05,2.1)-1.05 + vec2(0,11) ), \
        q.z = mod(q.z,2.) - 1.,                      /* z-repeat          */ \
        q.x -= .5,                                   /* faces = 0yz plane */ \
        min( length(vec2(q.x,abs(q.y)-.87)) -.1,                             \
             max(length(vec2(q.x,.87*abs(q.z)+.5*q.y-.5))-.1, abs(q.y)-.9) ) \
     )


void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,l;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -R.y) - R),                       // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,5), P,q,                                     // marching point along ray 
          C = iMouse.z > 0. ? 6.*iMouse.xyz/R -3.                   // camera control
                            : 3.* cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0));     // demo mode

    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )                  // march scene
        P = p, 
        P.yz *= rot(-C.y),                                          // rotations
        P.xz *= rot(-C.x),
        T(P),                                                       // large structure
     // t = T(P)*3.,                                                // debug: visualize it
        q = 6.* vec3( P.x, abs(P.y)-.87, P.z),                      // long tubes
        t = length(T(q)) -.1 , 
        q = 6.* vec3( P.x, .87*abs(P.z)+.5*P.y-.5, .5*P.z-.87*P.y*sign(P.z) ),
        t = min(t, max( length(T(q)) -.1 , abs(q.y)-.9) ),          // short tubes
        p += .07*t*D;                                                // step forward = dist to obj  
    
   O *= O*O*O*2.;                                                   // color scheme 
}
